name: AdvancedBackAndForthMovement
shortDescription: Back and forth movement with optional start delay, end pause, sprite flipping, and optional per instance overrides.
description: This extension adds a behavior that moves a Sprite back and forth on one axis, reversing after a set distance, with optional delay, pause, sprite flip, and animation sync.
* Simple sentry style motion with optional pauses at each end.
Add the **Advanced Back and Forth Movement** behavior to a Sprite object, then configure:
* **Reset animation index on pause** (optional, only relevant if animation sync is enabled)
You can change speed, distance, direction, pauses, delays, enabled state, sprite flipping, and animation synchronization at runtime via actions.
You can override behavior settings per instance using object variables.
If a child exists, it overrides the corresponding behavior setting for that instance. If it does not exist, the behavior default is used.
If both structures exist on the same instance, __AdvancedBackAndForthMovement takes precedence and ABFM is ignored.
* `MoveSpeed` (number): movement speed in pixels per second.
* `MoveHorizontal` (boolean): true for horizontal movement, false for vertical.
* `StartPositive` (boolean): true starts in the positive direction (right or down), false starts in the negative direction (left or up).
* `PauseTime` (number): pause duration at each end in seconds.
* `Enabled` (boolean): enables or disables movement for that instance.
* `FlipSprite` (boolean): enables or disables sprite flipping on direction reverse for that instance.
* `SyncAnimation` (boolean): enables or disables synchronizing animation state (paused/playing) with movement for that instance.
* `AnimationReset` (boolean): enables or disables resetting animation index to frame 0 when a pause begins for that instance, only relevant if `SyncAnimation` is true.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Moves an object back and forth by distance, with optional start delay, end pauses, sprite flipping, and per instance overrides.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AdvancedBackAndForthMovement

propertyDescriptors.label: Travel distance
propertyDescriptors.description: Distance the object should travel before turning around (pixels)

propertyDescriptors.label: Move speed
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed the object moves (pixels per second)

propertyDescriptors.label: Initial direction
propertyDescriptors.description: What direction should the object face and move towards at the start?

propertyDescriptors.label: Movement orientation
propertyDescriptors.description: Selects the movement axis, horizontal or vertical
propertyDescriptors.name: MovementAxis

propertyDescriptors.label: Flip sprite on movement reverse
propertyDescriptors.description: Flip the object when direction changes. The sprite should face right by default for horizontal movement, and down by default for vertical movement
propertyDescriptors.name: FlipSprite

propertyDescriptors.label: Movement start delay (seconds)
propertyDescriptors.description: Adds a delay before the object starts moving
propertyDescriptors.name: StartDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Pause between direction reversals
propertyDescriptors.description: Adds a hold time when it reaches an end before reversing
propertyDescriptors.name: PauseTimeAtReversals

propertyDescriptors.label: Synchronize animation with movement
propertyDescriptors.description: Pauses/resumes animation with movement, if start delay or reversal pause are set
propertyDescriptors.name: AnimationSync

propertyDescriptors.label: Reset animation index on pause
propertyDescriptors.description: If true, current animation will reset to frame 0 on pause
